events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorised under Engineering roles based on the skills you provided including software development expertise.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to your profile to assist you through the hiring process for the software engineering role.
The initial screening call has been completed successfully; the recruiter shared positive feedback about your background and experience.
Thank you for your prompt response confirming your availability for the upcoming technical interview scheduled next week.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th, 2024, at 2 PM UTC. Please prepare accordingly and check your email for the invite.
Congratulations on completing your technical interview successfully. The interviewers were impressed with your problem-solving skills and technical knowledge.
The HR interview has been scheduled for May 15th, 2024, at 11 AM UTC. Please ensure you are available for this final round.
The HR interview was completed and went very well. They appreciated your communication skills and alignment with company culture.
We are pleased to propose you an official offer for the Software Engineer role. The offer details were sent to your registered email address.
